f1dim.c

00001 extern int ncom;        /* defined in LINMIN */
00002 extern double *pcom,*xicom,(*nrfunc)();
00003 
00004 double my_f1dim(x)
00005 double x;
00006 {
00007         int j;
00008         double f,*xt,*my_vector();
00009         void my_free_vector();
00010 
00011         xt=my_vector(1,ncom);
00012         for (j=1;j<=ncom;j++) xt[j]=pcom[j]+x*xicom[j];
00013         f=(*nrfunc)(xt);
00014         my_free_vector(xt,1,ncom);
00015         return f;
00016 }
